title: How to find my purchase history
author: Jamie
content:
All accepted payment methods are listed below. Please read this article to know how to find your purchase record.

For security reasons, you'll be required to send us a screenshot of your payment details when we handle problems related to account and user payment. Please find your payment method and follow the instructions to find your payment details.

Alipay

We need the "Merchant Order Number" in the billing details to confirm which account your payment is associated with.

  1. Please go to the "My" item in the Alipay client and enter "Bill"
  2. Find payment records related to "LetsGo Service" in the list
  3. Then, please click "More" on the billing interface and provide a screenshot of the bill that includes the "Merchant Order Number".

Google Play

Due to the limit of Google Play, you can only find the listed information in the software:

  • purchase time
  • the amount of your purchase

However, the information above can't help us find your payment record.

We need you to search "LetsGo Network" in your mailbox of Google Play and find your order number on the receipt so that we can check which account you are associated with.

VISA / Master Card

By providing us the information listed below, we can help you find the associated account:

  • the last four digit number of the bank card you used to make the purchase
  • a screenshot of your payment record that includes purchase time and amount

UnionPay

Android UnionPay / PayTM

We'd ask you to enter an email address in the purchasing process.

By providing us the information listed below, we can help you find the associated account:

  • the email address
  • the screenshot of your payment record that includes purchase time and amount

If you didn't enter an email or forgot the email address, we can't help you find the associated account.

Official Website UnionPay

We need the â€œlast four digits of the payment card numberâ€ from the billing details to confirm which account your payment is associated with. You can check your UnionPay payment records using these methods :

UnionPay App:

  1. Open the UnionPay App and select â€œMe,â€ then go to â€œMy Bills.â€
  2. Use the filter function in the list to find payment records related to â€œLetsGo Network.â€
  3. Open the detailed bill interface and take a screenshot.

Payment Bank App:

  1. Open the Payment Bank App and locate the â€œFind Billâ€ feature.
  2. Use the filter function in the list to find payment records related to â€œLetsGo Network.â€
  3. Open the detailed bill interface and take a screenshot.

Wechat Pay

We need the 'Merchant Order Number' from your billing details to confirm which account your payment is associated with.

  1. Please open "WeChat", select "Me" in the bottom right corner, then choose "Services".
  2. Select "Wallet" and click on â€œBillsâ€ in the top right corner.
  3. Look for payment records related to the merchant names "ekailing", "Ecsunshine", â€œDO DREAM LIMITEDâ€, â€œFLAGBIN TRADING CO.,LIMITEDâ€, â€œSUNNY TRICKLE TRADING LIMITEDâ€, â€œYOUNG FOLIAGE TRADING CO., LIMITEDâ€, â€œKAILING ECOMMERCE PTE. LTD.â€.

Apple

After successful payment with Apple pay, you will receive an email receipt. If you don't receive the email, please do the following to fix the problem.

  1. Click the "iTunes Store and App Store" under Settings menu.
  2. Click your Apple ID, then "View My Apple ID"
  3. Click the "Purchase history" and find the purchase item associated with lets and click Resend at the bottom.

WebMoney

Please follow the instructions on the gif to get the screenshot of your payment record that includes purchase time and amount.

By providing us the information listed below, we can help you find the associated account:

  • the email address that you entered in the purchasing process
  • the screenshot of your payment record that includes purchase time and amount

If you didn't enter an email or forgot the email address, we can't help you find the associated account.

If you encounter any problem while using LetsVPN, don't hesitate to email us at letsvpn@rbox.me. Our customer support team is happy to assist you.
